Package calc

Class Shell

  • java.lang.Object
    • calc.Shell
  • public class Shell
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Shell This class is the simple Shell Waiting for the user to input data, for our RPN Calculator and then handles the data accordingly to the chosen type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Shell()  
      Shell​(calc.Shell.Type type)  
      Shell​(java.util.Stack<java.math.BigDecimal> stack)  
      Shell​(java.util.Stack<java.math.BigDecimal> stack, java.util.ArrayList<java.math.BigDecimal> history)  
      Shell​(java.util.Stack<java.math.BigDecimal> stack, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.math.BigDecimal> variables)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected boolean canDoOperation()
      Checks if an operation is doable, we look at the Stack, and if it has enough elements, we can do an operation
      protected void doOperation​(java.lang.String op)
      This functions will do the operation in parameter if possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
      protected void findHist​(java.lang.String index)
      This functions will find the variable at index in history if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
      protected void findPile​(java.lang.String index)
      This functions will find the variable at index in the stack if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
      protected void findVariables​(java.lang.String var)
      This functions will find the variable in varaibles if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
      protected void popVariables​(java.lang.String line)
      This functions will pop the numeric in stack if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
      static void selectTypeAndLaunch()
      This function asks the user to select the type of the values he wants to use in this RPN Calculator.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • canDoOperation

        protected boolean canDoOperation()
        Checks if an operation is doable, we look at the Stack, and if it has enough elements, we can do an operation
        Returns:
        true if we can do an operation

      • doOperation

        protected void doOperation​(java.lang.String op)
        This functions will do the operation in parameter if possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
        Parameters:
        op - String

      • findHist

        protected void findHist​(java.lang.String index)
        This functions will find the variable at index in history if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
        Parameters:
        index - String

      • findPile

        protected void findPile​(java.lang.String index)
        This functions will find the variable at index in the stack if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
        Parameters:
        index - String

      • findVariables

        protected void findVariables​(java.lang.String var)
        This functions will find the variable in varaibles if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
        Parameters:

      • popVariables

        protected void popVariables​(java.lang.String line)
        This functions will pop the numeric in stack if it is possible, else it will print a message explaining the error.
        Parameters:
        line - String

      • selectTypeAndLaunch

        public static void selectTypeAndLaunch()
        This function asks the user to select the type of the values he wants to use in this RPN Calculator. Available types are : [decimals (default), integers, booleans] It will then launch the actual Shell and Calculator.
